issue.title: [C++] Bump versions of bundled dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16724](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16724). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should bump bundled dependencies to their latest respective versions before 9.0.0.
